channel.title: Client.java Help
channel.description:
I can never find my client.java, I don't know if its just called something else or if its just not there. I've looked everywhere I could think of and searched my source and client. I have a file that is just called client..... is that it?
If not I'd appreciate if someone could tell me where to go so I could find it.
Its a 508 server called Epz V2.0 (Elite Prodigyz)
It got uploaded not too long ago,
Thanks!

item.title: Client.java Help
item.dc:creator: @jakerc1 jakerc1
item.description:
@jakerc1 wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:7, topic:397694”]Then you may be compiling wrong. I need to know your revision(Ex:317). If it’s a 317, try this compile code:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/quote]

My compiler works with some of the files but not all, ex. client, gui, playerassistent, .config, and a few others, It works with all the shops, NPC’s, where they spawn and drop, And I’ve dowloaded jdk, and changed the compiler to match the folder, but the code I am using is

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java$RPMP07O.0_25\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

The “$RPMP07O_25” is weird I know but it the name of my folder…

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java Help
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Then you may be compiling wrong. I need to know your revision(Ex:317). If it’s a 317, try this compile code:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java Help
item.dc:creator: @jakerc1 jakerc1
item.description:
@jakerc1 wrote:

Dude your files aren’t hidden. “Client” is “Client.java”.
[/quote]

I know that ones not hidden, I’ve accessed it many times before, what I’m trying to figure out is when I change something in it, and then compile, it never changes in the game?

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java Help
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“jakerc1, post:4, topic:397694”][quote author=sonicforce41 link=topic=494834.msg3617724#msg3617724 date=1307128406]
When you compile and it doesnt give you any where saying missing class file.
It means the class file is set to hidden. In your folder properties, click view and click show hidden files and folders.
[/quote]

I tried this and in the properties of the folders I couldn’t find the “show hidden files and folders” option. Could you say where to go to get it? The only option with “hide” in it, was to hide the actual folder itself. (Which I still tried and it didn’t work)[/quote]

Dude your files aren’t hidden. “Client” is “Client.java”.

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java Help
item.dc:creator: @jakerc1 jakerc1
item.description:
@jakerc1 wrote:

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:3, topic:397694”]When you compile and it doesnt give you any where saying missing class file.
It means the class file is set to hidden. In your folder properties, click view and click show hidden files and folders.[/quote]

I tried this and in the properties of the folders I couldn’t find the “show hidden files and folders” option. Could you say where to go to get it? The only option with “hide” in it, was to hide the actual folder itself. (Which I still tried and it didn’t work)

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java Help
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

When you compile and it doesnt give you any where saying missing class file.
It means the class file is set to hidden. In your folder properties, click view and click show hidden files and folders.

item.title: Client.java Help
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“jakerc1, post:1, topic:397694”]I can never find my client.java, I don’t know if its just called something else or if its just not there. I’ve looked everywhere I could think of and searched my source and client. I have a file that is just called client… is that it?

If not I’d appreciate if someone could tell me where to go so I could find it.

Its a 508 server called Epz V2.0 (Elite Prodigyz)

It got uploaded not too long ago,

Thanks![/quote]

Yes, the file called “Client” is the client.java

Read full topic
